text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “E jenumanja wandu! Chisimu une ni Ntenga jwa Allah kukwenu wanaose, Ajula jwauli Wakwe uchimwene wa kumawunde ni petaka, pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuwajilwa kun'galagatila) ikaweje Jwelepejo, akupelekaga umi ni chiwa, basi munkulupililani Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe, Ntume jwangapakombola kulemba ni kuwalanga, ajula jwaakunkulupilila Allah ni malowe Gakwe, ni munkuyani kuti n'jongoche.”
